document.full_text: one of pakistan's most powerful militant groups plans to step up its fight against american troops in neighboring afghanistan in response to intensified u.s. drone missile strikes on its territory, two of its commanders said on wednesday.
document.title: pakistan militant group vows to escalate fight in afghanistan
lines_and_colors: one of pakistan's most powerful militant groups plans to step up its fight against american troops in neighboring afghanistan in response to intensified u.s. drone missile strikes on its territory, two of its commanders said on wednesday.
